mapper.sql: t1.id as "id", t1.version as "version", t1.name as "name", t1.code as "code", t1.parent_id as "parentId", t1.state as "state", t1.memo as "memo", t1.order_no as "orderNo", t1.keyword as "keyword", t1.del_flag as "delFlag", t1.date_created as "dateCreated", t1.date_updated as "dateUpdated"
mapper.insert: insert into org_department( id, version, name, code, parent_id, state, memo, order_no, keyword, del_flag, date_created, date_updated ) values ( #{id}, 0, #{name}, #{code}, #{parentId}, #{state}, #{memo}, #{orderNo}, #{keyword}, 0, now(), now() )

insert into org_department( id, version, name, code, parent_id, state, memo, order_no, keyword, del_flag, date_created, date_updated ) values
( #{t.id}, 0, #{t.name}, #{t.code}, #{t.parent_id}, #{t.state}, #{t.memo}, #{t.orderNo}, #{t.keyword}, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select count(0) from org_department where id = #{id}

select
from org_department t1 where 1=1
and t1.del_flag=#{delFlag}
and t1.del_flag=0
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.date_created,'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateBegin},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.date_created,'%Y-%m-%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d')
